input_text:
Job Title: AI, Intern

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
At G-P, our mission is to break down barriers to global business, enabling opportunities for everyone, everywhere. With remote-first and diverse teams all around the world, our people are key to achieving this mission. That’s wy we trust our Dream Team members with the flexibility and autonomy to do their best and most innovative work, encourage and support their personal growth and career development, and believe in recognition for a job well done.

Our industry-leading SaaS-based Global Employment Platform™ enables our customers to expand and grow into 180+ countries, creating more opportunities for global success – without requiring entity or subsidiary

Responsibilities

 Collaborate with our team of AI experts to develop and optimize generative AI and NLP modelsConduct research on state-of-the-art techniques and algorithms in the AI and NLP domainContribute to the design, implementation, and evaluation of novel AI and NLP solutionsAnalyse and interpret data to improve model performance and efficiencyAssist in the documentation and presentation of research findings and project resultsParticipate in team meetings and contribute to the ongoing development of the team's goals and objectives

Requirements

Currently pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related fieldStrong proficiency in Python programming language, with experience in relevant AI and NLP libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLTK, spaCy)Demonstrable passion for artificial intelligence, with a focus on generative AI and NLPFamiliarity with machine learning algorithms and concepts, such as supervised/unsupervised learning, deep learning, and neural networksStrong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologiesExcellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a team setting

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure)Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git) and software development methodologies (e.g., Agile)Previous experience with AI or NLP research or projects

What We Offer

A 12-week, full-time, paid internship for a 3rd year student with the opportunity to work on real-world AI and NLP projectsA collaborative, supportive, and inclusive work environment where you can grow and learn from experienced professionalAccess to state-of-the-art tools and resources to further your learning and developmentThe opportunity to contribute and make a meaningful impact in the AI industry

The annual gross base salary range for this position is $60,000- $75,000 per year (prorated over 12 weeks).Actual compensation for this position may vary and will depend on multiple factors including relevant qualifications, experience, education and geographic location.

About Us

G-P helps growing companies unlock their full potential by making it possible to build highly skilled global teams in days instead of months. Through our SaaS-based platform, we help find, hire, onboard, pay, and manage team members, quickly and compliantly, to expand growth opportunities for everyone, everywhere – without the hassle of setting up local subsidiaries or branch offices.

G-P. Global Made Possible.

G-P is a proud Equal Opportunity Employer, and we are committed to building and maintaining a diverse, equitable and inclusive culture that celebrates authenticity. We prohibit discrimination and harassment against employees or applicants on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, age, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, and pregnancy-related conditions), gender identity or expression (including transgender status), sexual orientation, marital status, military service and veteran status, physical or mental disability, genetic information, or any other legally protected status.

G-P also is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need an accommodation due to a disability during the interview process, please contact us at careers@g-p.com.

Experience Level (if available): Internship
